casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Lee JOHNSON, Sr. No. 152P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Anne Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of March 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
